Topic.Title: Gamebook - Any way to order the page links?

Posts.EditableText:
Let's say I have a page taking the appearance of a shop. I have five items to buy, an option to leave and an option to talk to the merchant. Is there a way to sort manually sort the links at the bottom of the page so that the cheapest items are at the top?

Also is there a way to sort pages in the page browser other than by time added?

Thanks
